verses.name: 1 Kings 12:11
verses.text: And now whereas my father did lade you with a heavy yoke, I will add to your yoke: my father hath chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:12
verses.text: So Jeroboam and all the people came to Rehoboam the third day, as the king had appointed, saying, Come to me again the third day.

verses.name: 1 Kings 12:13
verses.text: And the king answered the people roughly, and forsook the old men’s counsel that they gave him;
